casebody.data:
Isaias UMALI, petitioner,
v.
Michael CAPRA, Superintendent, Sing Sing Correctional Facility, et al. No. 14-5099. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 6, 2014.

Opinion

Motion of National Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
